caption.p: Variation of the maximum atmospheric temperature (TXx, left column) and humidity (specific humidity, right column). ( a,b): current level; ( c,d): 1.5 °C scenario; ( e,f): 2 °C scenario; ( g,h): INDC continued mitigation scenario; ( i,j): INDC delayed mitigation scenario; ( k,l): INDC delayed mitigation scenario minus the current level.
